/* SalePriceHistory.getSalePriceHistoryList */
SELECT tlmpspl.PROD_CD, tmp.PROD_NM, tlmpspl.SALE_UPRC, tlmpspl.B_SALE_UPRC, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(tlmpspl.START_DATE, 'yyyymmdd'), 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS START_DATE, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(tlmpspl.END_DATE, 'yyyymmdd'), 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS END_DATE, tlmpspl.STIN_SALE_UPRC, tlmpspl.B_STIN_SALE_UPRC, tlmpspl.DLVR_SALE_UPRC, tlmpspl.B_DLVR_SALE_UPRC, tlmpspl.PACK_SALE_UPRC, tlmpspl.B_PACK_SALE_UPRC, tlmpspl.PROC_FG, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(tlmpspl.PROC_DT ,'YYYYMMDDhh24miss'), 'YYYY/MM/DD hh24:mi:ss') AS PROC_DT, tlmpspl.MOD_ID
FROM TB_LG_MS_PRODUCT_SALE_PRICE_LOG tlmpspl, TB_MS_PRODUCT tmp WHERE tlmpspl.STORE_CD = #{storeCd} AND tlmpspl.PROC_DT BETWEEN #{startDate} || '000000' AND #{endDate} || '999999'
AND tlmpspl.PROD_CD LIKE '%'||#{prodCd}||'%'
AND tmp.PROD_NM LIKE '%'||#{prodNm}||'%'
AND tmp.PROD_CLASS_CD IN ( SELECT PROD_CLASS_CD FROM TB_MS_PRODUCT_CLASS WHERE STORE_CD = #{storeCd} START WITH PROD_CLASS_CD = #{prodClassCd} AND STORE_CD = #{storeCd} CONNECT BY P_PROD_CLASS_CD = PRIOR PROD_CLASS_CD AND STORE_CD = #{storeCd} )
AND tmp.STORE_CD = tlmpspl.STORE_CD AND tmp.PROD_CD (+) = tlmpspl.PROD_CD ORDER BY tlmpspl.STORE_CD, tlmpspl.PROD_CD, tlmpspl.PROC_DT
